WriteToFilePath.description: Specify either the full or relative file path where the downloaded data should be stored. If a relative file path is used, the file is stored in the path relative to the platform's internal [documents](https://docs.nativescript.org/api/namespace/knownFolders#documents) folder. In iOS, this property is needed if you want to support background download for larger file. This property is supported only in iOS and Android.
